casebody.data:
No. 1343,

Misc.

Pope v. Ferguson, Judge, et al. Tom H. Davis for petitioner. Crawford C. Martin, Attorney General of Texas, Nola White, First Assistant Attorney General, Pat Bailey, Executive Assistant Attorney General, and Robert C. Flowers and Gilbert J. Pena, Assistant Attorneys General, for respondents.

Sup. Ct. Tex. Certiorari denied.
